remarks: The identity arrow in the category of categories is the identity functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catccatid.c $e |- C = ( CatCat ` U ) $.
catccatid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
catcid.o $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
catcid.i $e |- I = ( idFunc ` X ) $.
catcid.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
catcid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
catcid $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = I ) $.
